name: Dispell (agentsmith200)
description:
Entry for the 20 Second Game Jam

An enemy wizard has cast a deadly spell at you!

Luckily, your protective wards activated and have slowed down time to give you a chance to counter the enemy spell.

Consult your spell book, and use the appropriate ingredients to counter the spell that's slowly flying towards you,

Click on the circle to bring up available runes, the herb or gem bags to bring up available herbs or gems, and the book pile to see which grimoire to use.

Have the correct ingredients to counter the spell on the table before time runs out to win.

Assets Used:
